import React from 'react'; import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import {requestLoginUser, detailUser} from '../modules/auth'; import {toggleSearch} from '../modules/search'; import {changeLocale} from "../modules/localize"; const Header = () => { const {user, loading} = useSelector(state => state.auth); const {token, flag} = useSelector(state => state.localize); const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
dispatch(toggleSearch())}>
  • dispatch(changeLocale(1))}> {token.french}
  • dispatch(changeLocale(2))}> {token.english}
{ loading ? (
) : user ? (
{token.hi}
{user.pseudo}
dispatch(detailUser())}>
) : (
)}
) }; export default Header;
